EmailTemplate.name: 10-08-21 HOS TECHFEST 2021.TECHFEST Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the date! TechFest 2021
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Mark your calendar now for the 2021 Virtual TechFest. This year’s TechFest conference will take place on November 9-11, 2021. This annual conference is packed with experts and insights, plus peer-to-peer networking opportunities to help you enhance your Aloha skills – with no travel expenses. Stay tuned for updates regarding registration, and more. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
